item.title: On Digital Gardens
item.description: This digital garden is one of my personal projects this year! I’m still learning if there’s a proper way of setting it up. I realized how unconducive for permanence my past notes were. I literally have too much bookmark managers + mind dumps (thanks Apple Notes, Telegram, Messenger, Mem.ai for keeping up with me). What’s a digital garden? A digital garden is an online space at the intersection of a notebook and a blog, where digital gardeners share seeds of thoughts to be cultivated in public.

item.title: What to answer to 'mamamatay rin tayong lahat'
item.description: This may seem.. morbid. While I do admit that I sometimes say “Mamamatay din tayong lahat” in an escapist manner (albeit true), I do acknowledge that it is true, comforting, and a good way to move forward when it comes to handling problems. However, this acceptance into the finite nature of life also makes one prone to not living ceasing each day. Embracing stoicism is a good way to avoid that mistake.
